response.original_title: In the Footsteps of Willie Sutton
response.overview: America's most famous bank robber of the twentieth century doesn't fancy prison accommodations. When he gets caught and confined, he escapes ... three times! In the Footsteps of Willie Sutton is a documentary film that follow this gentleman bandit's criminal career that spans over four decades.
response.title: In the Footsteps of Willie Sutton
